qas.question: What did the Thonburi Technology Institute become after its name change?

answers.text: King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi

qas.question: What was the previous name of Rajamangala University of Technology?

answers.text: Institute of Technology and Vocational Education

context: There are two former institutes of technology, which already changed their name to "University of Technology": Rajamangala University of Technology (formerly <a1_0>Institute of Technology and Vocational Education<a1_0/>) and <a0_0>King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi<a0_0/> (Thonburi Technology Institute).
